title: The Game of Love 1
description: Jessica Watkins PresentsThe Game of Love by K. Alex WalkerHow was it possible that everything about this woman, every single damn thing he encountered, was so wonderful?Professional Quarterback Austin Riley has always been smitten with the lovely Sommer Hayes. Having known each other their entire lives, the majority of their relationship exchanges were sneers, insults, smirks, and jeers. Now, ten years have passed since he last stepped foot in his hometown. He and Sommer run into each other again, only to find out that they both share the same their hatred towards each other had merely been a cover-up for the true feelings that they'd kept hidden.However, another hidden secret is also lying in wait, waiting to tear them apart.
author: K. Alex Walker
